content: without earflaps by casting on 104 112 sts if you do start with the ribbing consider going down a needle size the earflap version is meant to fit a bit looser around the base of the hat earflaps make two using navy blue and two size 6 dpns cast on 4 sts leaving a long tail work how to knit i-cord 6 inches of i-cord write down number of row worked _____________ cast on 4 sts k4 slide these start flap sts to other end of dpn k4 change to size 7 needle for earflaps after a few row mark rs with a pin yarn will be coming out of row 1 k2 blco k2 5 sts the 4th st when you start row 2 sl2 wyif p1 sl2 wyif eventually the knitting will row 3 k2 yo k1 yo k2 7 sts form a tube continue until row 4 sl2 wyif k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl sl2 wyif desired length is reached row 5 k2 yo p1 k1 p1 yo k2 9 sts row 6 sl2 wyif p1 tbl k1 p1 k1 p1 tbl sl2 wyif row 7 k2 yo k1 p1 to last 3 sts k1 yo k2 11 sts     row 8 sl2 wyif k1 tbl p1 k1 to last 4 sts p1 k1 tbl sl2 wyif    row 9 k2 yo p1 k1 to last 3 sts p1 yo k2 13 sts    row 10 sl2 wyif p1 tbl k1 p1 to last 4 sts k1 p1 tbl sl2 wyif    repeat row 7-10 an additional 3 times work row 7 once more 27 sts cut yarn make two note for larger size work two additional row as set without increases join earflaps and cast on hat sts sz 7 needle using navy yarn and cable cast on method cast on 11 13 sts turn work so cast on sts are held in your righthand take one of the earflaps and hold it in your left hand with the ws facing slip last cast on st from rh needle to lh needle p2tog then continue to work across first flap as follows p1 k1 to last 2 sts p2 turn work so rs is facing cast on 30 34 sts for front of hat turn work and join second earflap as you did the first cont across second flap as before turn work so rs is facing cast on 12 14 sts join to work in the round by making sure your knitting is not twisted slip 1st cast on st from rh needle to lh needle pass last cast on st over the first return st to rh needle place bor marker this is the center back of the hat each earflap is 27 sts front of hat is 29 33 sts back of hat is 21 25 sts 104 112 sts check your stitch count work k1 p1 ribbing for 1 inch the earflap ribbing
